title: identify this font
content:
I need to know what font is it

Thanks in advance

author: zet2003

comments.content:
Thanks, but I have got the font in another forum, myfonts.com,

The font is Barmeno Bold,

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/barmeno-pro/bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015010941/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/barmeno-pro/bold/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/barmeno-pro/bold/")

but thanks for you reply
